                    java.lang.String keyName,
                    java.lang.String carriedKeyName,
                    java.security.cert.X509Certificate recvCert)
             throws DigiDocException
Constructor for object

Parameters:
id - Id atribute value (optional)
recipient - Recipient atribute value (optional)
encryptionMethod - sublements atribute Algorithm value (required). The only currently supported value is EncryptedData.DENC_ENC_METHOD_RSA1_5 !
keyName - sublements value (optional)
carriedKeyName - sublements value (optional)
recvCert - recipients certificate (required)
Throws:
DigiDocException - for all errors
